title: Emerald Swarna Jhumka: Regal Dazzle in Every Drop
features: Intricate filigree design featuring flower motifs set with shimmering CZ stones surrounding lush emerald imitation. Teardrop emerald drop suspended from a delicate gold plated filigree frame, culminating in a lustrous cultured pearl. Modern interpretation of a classic Jhumka style. Features a secure push-back clasp for comfortable wear.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
and special celebrations. Suitable for Muhurtham
or any occasion where you want to add a touch of traditional elegance to your look.
description: A stunning blend of traditional South Indian design and contemporary aesthetics. The vibrant emerald green and radiant gold create a captivating contrast. These Jhumkas are lightweight and comfortable to wear, making them ideal for long celebrations. High-quality materials ensure durability and lasting beauty. This piece embodies timeless elegance and makes a perfect heirloom.
